1-1. ORM vs JavaScript

  • TypeORM

      const boards = Board.find({
      title: 'Hello'.
      status: 'PUBLIC'
  });

  • JavaScript

      db.query('SELECT * FROM boards WHERE title = 'Hello' AND status = 'PUBLIC', (err, result) => 
      if(err) throw new Error('Error');
      boards = result.rows;
  });
